333577.「ラキは <pc>に 頼みがある。\n ……ポルテのことだ。:
Lycae has a favor to ask...
It's about Porte.

333578.「キューロピアから 戻ってきたあと\n ポルテは……ずっと おとなしい。:
After we got back from Kyuropia,
Porte, she's...she's been very quiet.

333579.「あんまり 笑わなくなったし\n このあいだは 夜中に 泣いていた。\n たぶん:
She doesn't smile much anymore, and just
the other night, she was crying. Probably
because of what happened with Sister...

333580.「……労せずして 神のチカラを得られた。\n お前たちが 女神を\n 痛めつけて:
...I have gained this divine power without
effort. I have you to thank for tormenting
her.

333581.「隊長の話……最後のほうが\n よく わかんないよ……。:
That last part of what you said...
I don't really understand it...

333582.「ゼネシアねえさまは みんなに ウソをついて\n ひどいことを たくらんでた。\:
Sister lied to us all, plotting terrible
things. And then, she went back in time
and died...

333583.「ねえさまのしたことを 考えると\n ラキは とても悲しい……。\n でも ポル:
Thinking about all the horrible things Sister
didーit makes Lycae sad. But Porte...she's
a lot more hurt.

333584.「ラキは いつものポルテに なってほしい。\n お願い！ チカラを貸して！:
Lycae wants Porte to be her usual self again.
Please, you have to help!

333585.「ポルテは おいしいものが 大好き。\n ごちそうを作ったら きっと 笑ってくれ:
She loves delicious food. If Lycae cooks
a meal for her, she's sure to smile!
Please show him how!

333586.「いいじゃない <pc>！\n 私たちで 協力してあげましょうよ。:
How nice, <pc>!
Let's do it together!

333587.「ふたりに 挨拶しようとしたら\n ぜんぶ 聞こえちゃって……。\n 立ち聞きし:
I came to say hello to you two, but couldn't
help but overhear your conversation...
I didn't mean to eavesdrop, really!

333588.「キューロピアという世界で 何があったのかは\n おおよそ ラキから聞いているわ:
Lycae told me about everything that happened
in Kyuropia... Porte has every right to feel
the way she is now.

333589.「私だって まだ 信じられないもの。\n ゼニアスの優しい女神様が 悪者で\n:
I still can't believe it. Such a sweet
goddess, turned evil? And to die too, no
less...

333590.「でもね 人には 色んな側面があるわ。\n とても許せないような 悪いことをした:
But, you knowーa person can have many sides
to them. Just because someone's done horrible
things doesn't mean we have to forget the
<nt>
good.

333591.「今 すぐには 難しいかもしれないけれど\n ラキも ポルテちゃんも いつかきっ:
I know it's tough right now, but I know you
and Porte will get through this. There's no
doubt in my mind.

333592.「元気がないのは ポルテだ！\n ラキは…平気……。:
Porte's the one who is not feeling well!
Lycae, he's...he's fine...

333593.「そうよね ラキ。\n おかしなことを言って ごめんなさい。:
Yes, you're right. Sorry about what I said
before.

333594.「さあ！ みんなで おいしい料理を作って\n ポルテちゃんを 元気づけてあげまし:
Okay then! Let's make a delicious dish
together for Porte! I was thinkingーmaybe
some kind of meat dish?

333595.「なんでもいい。\n ラキが 作れるものなら……。:
Anything is fine, as long as Lycae can
make it...

333596.「そうだわ！ おにぎりは どうかしら？\n 炊きたてごはんを にぎって たまご焼:
Oh, yeah! How about rice balls? We can cook them with fresh rice, and pack them into a lunch box with some fried egg! She's sure
to love that!

333597.「おにぎりの決め手は お米の銘柄！\n このあいだ カミハルムイ王から いいお米:
The key to great rice balls is what brand you
use! I got some good rice from Kamiharmui
just the other day, so we should use that.

333598.「……よく わからないけど それでいい。:
...Lycae doesn't really get it, but that
should work.

333599.「おにぎりで 決まりね！\n <pc>。王都キィンベルの軍司令部\n １階にある:
Okay then, it's decided! Rice balls it is!
<pc>, could you go to Kimbel for me
and go to the kitchen inside the Army HQ?

333600.「料理長のホアーマさんに 声をかけて\n エルトナ豊穣の米 って銘柄の\n お米:
Hoarma is the head chef. Please ask her for
some. It's called Bountiful Eltona Rice.

333601.「私とラキは あなたが戻るまで\n たまご焼きを作る 特訓をしておくわ。\n と:
While we wait for you to get back, Lycae and I
will practice making eggs. We'll make
something great for sure!

333602.「エルトナ豊穣の米が 手に入ったら\n あなたの家の キッチンに 集合しましょう:
When you get the rice, meet us inside the
kitchen in your house. Thanks again!

333603.「……<pc>。\n このことは ポルテには 内緒にして。: Please don't tell Porte about this.

333605.「ラキが ポルテちゃんのために\n おいしいものを作って 元気づけたいって。\n:
It was Lycae's idea to make something yummy
to cheer you up. The three of us made it
together!

333606.「ありがと！ すっごく おいしそうだね。\n さっそく いただいちゃおーっと♪: Thanks, it looks great! I'll dig riiiight in!

333607.「あはっ おにぎりだ！ いいねぇ～。\n おかずは たまご焼き？ わかってるぅ！:
Haha! Riceballs, how nice! And fried eggs,
too? You know me too well!

333608.「おぉっ！ まさに 幸せの味<heart> おいっし～い！\n 君！ 本日のシェ:
Oooh... Truly the taste of happiness itself...
How yummy! "You there! Give the chef my
regards!" is what I'd totally say!

333610.「あたし……心配かけちゃったよね。\n ほんと ごめん。:
I've been worrying you guys, huh...
I'm really sorry.

333611.「ゼネシアねえさまのこと 考えてた？:
You've been thinking about Sister, haven't
you?

333613.「師匠は もうひとりの ポルテのこと。\n なんでも知ってて 強いけど\n ラキ:
The "master" is the other Porte. They know
a lot, and are really strong. But Lycae
likes this Porte better...

333614.「本物のポルテは 師匠のほう。\n あたしが もうひとり……なんだよ。:
The real Porte is my master.
I'm the..."other one".

333615.「……アストルティアの化身である 師匠は\n 世界を脅かす 創失の呪いに むしば:
My master is the embodiment of Astoltia,
and they were being consumed by the curse
of unmaking...

333616.「どうにかしたくても 創失の呪いのせいで\n 自由に動けなかった師匠は\n あた:
Because of the curse, they were not able to do
anything about it. That's when they decided to
create me.

333617.「師匠の手足となって 行動する人格\n ……それが あたし。\n あたしは ただ:
The personality that acts in my master's
place...is me. I'm just a substitute.

333618.「師匠が 表に出てるとき あたしの意識は\n 深く眠ってる。師匠が どこで何をし:
When my master is in control, I fall into a
really deep sleep. I have no idea where
they are, or what they're doing...

333619.「けど 師匠は いつも あたしの目を通して\n すべてを見てる。そして 夢の中で:
But they see everything I see through my eyes.
And, in my dreams, they tell me what I'm
supposed to do...

333620.「いつまで メソメソしておる。\n そなたらを騙して あやつっていた\n 悪しき:
How long are you going to just sulk around?
Forget about that wicked goddess.

333621.「でも ネーしゃまは いつも優しくて……\n ずっと みんなを 助けてくれたんだ:
But Zenny had always been kind... She's
helped so many!

333622.「そして 人の良い そなたらを まんまと騙し\n 主神の王冠を 探しださせた。:
And yet, she took advantage someone selfless
like you to find the Crown of the Almighty.

333623.「……すべて 新たな主神になるという\n やつの野望の布石。\n まやかしの優し:
Everything she has done until now was just a
means to become the new Almighty. Her
"kindness" is nothing more than a ruse.

333625.「知ってるけど……\n ポルテ師匠の身代わりでしかない あたしに\n ネーしゃま:
I know that, but... She gave me a name.
To me, the substitute...

333626.「ポルるんって……\n あたしだけの名前 呼んでくれたんだもん。:
Portie...
She called me by a name of my own.

333627.「創失を招くものとの 直接対決は 避けられぬ。\n 次に やつが出現したなら……:
A direct confrontation with That Which Unmakes
is inevitable. The next time it does is when I
will show myself.

333628.「そなたは しばし 謹慎だ。\n せいぜい 大人しくしていることだな。:
You are to remain under suspension for a
while. See to it that you behave yourself.

333629.「……師匠は これ以上 あたしを\n 危険に巻き込まないように 言ってくれてる。:
My master tells me that I shouldn't put myself
in any more danger. I at least know that much.

333630.「でも……なんか ぜんぶ 悪い夢みたいで。\n 今も ゼニアスに行ったら ネーし:
But...it all feels like a bad dream.
If I were to go to Zeniath now, Zenny could
be there, speaking softly...

333631.「あたしたちを 騙してたことも\n 死んじゃったのも ウソなんじゃないかって\n:
I just can't help but think that maybe all of
this is just a big lie... That she betrayed
us, and that she died...

333632.「<pc>さん みなさん\n お食事中 失礼します！:
Apologies for interrupting your meal
together!

333633.「サザミレ草原の沖に 突然 新しい島影が。\n そのうえ 島からは ただならぬ:
A strange island suddenly appeared off the
coast of the Sazamire Prairie. What's moreー
it's emanating an evil energy.

333634.「まさか 創失を招くものが\n アストルティアに 再び 毒牙を……？\n 調べに:
It can't be... Does That Which Unmakes mean
to strike at Astoltia again? We have to go
see!

333635.「ラキも 行く！\n もし 創失の呪いを あやつる敵だったら\n <pc>たちだ:
Lycae will come too!
You won't be able to fight against the
curse of unmaking alone.

333636.「あたしも 行くよ！\n 創失を招くものが 本当に ネーしゃまを\n 食べたなら:
I'm coming too! If that thing really did eat
Zenny, then I'm gonna make sure he pays
for it!

333637.「あれ……？ あれれ？\n なにこれ！？ 動けないよー！\n 師匠が 行くなって:
Huh...? What is going on?! I can't move at
all! Master...are you saying I can't go?

333638.「<pc>隊長 メレちー ラキ！\n あたしは 後から追いかけるから\n 先に:
I'll catch up with you guys later!
Go on without me!

333639.「異変が起きている場所は サザミレ草原。\n ナルビアの町 近くの 海岸沿いです:
The strange island is along the prairie's
coast, near Nalbia. Let's be on our way!

333640.「誰もいない……。\n だけど いやな気配が してる。:
Nobody is here...
But there's an unpleasant presence.

333641.「この時代に エテーネ王国が到着してから\n ひととおり周辺海域を 調査したけれ:
I've explored the surrounding seas when the
Ethene Kingdom came to this time, but I
don't remember any islands like this.

333642.「今のところ ただの無人島に見えるけど\n どういうことなのかしら……。:
It looks like any old deserted island, but
what could this mean...?

333645.「女神ゼネシアより 手に入れた\n 主神の王笏と王冠 そして 創生のチカラが\n:
The Scepter and Crown from the goddess...
The power of creation...
They made this island's reality possible.

333646.「神獣ふぜいが 神を喰ろうた わたしに\n かなうと 思うたか！:
You think a mere divine beast can stand up to
me?! I have devoured a goddess!

333648.「女神より得た 創生のチカラ……\n とくと 目に焼き付けるがよい！:
Behold this power of creation! Sear it into
your memory!

333649.「そんな……！？\n もうひとりの自分を 創生したというの！: No...! He's created a copy of himself?!

333650.「これでも わたしは 忙しい身なのでな。\n 塔の創生は 我が写し身に まかせる:
I am much too busy with other pressing
matters. I will leave the creation of the
tower to my proxy...

333652.「ほう……。またも 腕を上げたな。\n されど 時すでに遅し……だ。:
I see... So your abilities have improved yet
again. However...it is already too late.

333653.「塔から 創失の呪いが わきだしてる。\n それも……すごい勢い……！:
The curse is coming from that tower!
It's... It's really strong!

333654.「そうとも！ 女神から得たチカラは\n アストルティア全土の 創失すら\n 可能:
Indeed! With the goddess' power, even the
complete unmaking of Astoltia is possible!

333655.「答えなさい！ \n あなたは 何者なのです。\n いかなる理由があって こんな:
Answer me! Just who are you? Why are you
doing all this?!

333657.「すべては 宿命……\n アストルティアは その創生の時から\n 滅びる運命だっ:
All this is fate... Astoltia was doomed to
perish from the moment of its creation!
Nothing more!

333658.「創失の呪いでは 防がれるか。\n ならば……ゼニアスの主神のチカラなら\n お:
So the curse cannot stop you, I see...
Then, perhaps...the Almighty's power would
be more to your liking?

333659.「逃げてっ！ ふたりとも！！\n あれを くらったら……！:
You both need to run!
If that hits youー!

333660.「とりあえず 助かった……みたいね。\n でも どうして……？:
I guess we're safe for now...
But, why did he...?

333661.「……あの塔 入口がない。\n それに あいつのチカラで 近づけないみたい。:
There's no way to get in...and Lycae can't
get close because of his power.

333662.「分身を創生してまで 創った塔なのに\n どうして ほうりだした……？:
To go through all that to make this tower...
Why would he just leave it...?

333663.「……<cs_pchero>。私は パドレ叔父様に\n この塔のことを 知らせに:
I'm going to let Uncle Padre know about
this tower.

333664.「創失を招くものが いつ戻るか わからない。\n 島には 誰も 近付かないように:
We don't know when he will return, and we need
to make sure nobody comes near here.
I'll see you later!

333666.「ラキは あいつを 追いかける！\n <cs_pchero>。ゼニアスに 来て！:
Lycae will go after him!
Come to Zeniath, <cs_pchero>!

333667.創失を招くものは ゼニアスに 向かったようだ。\nひとまず はじまりの地へ 行っ:
That Which Unmakes appears to have made his
way to Zeniath. First, head to the Land of
Beginnings.

333669.「うっとうしい こわっぱめ……。\n ゼニアスまで追ってくるとは。:
Annoying pest! You'd really follow me all
the way here?

333670.「ゼニアスは ラキの だいじな故郷。\n おまえなんかに 手出しさせない！:
Zeniath is Lycae's precious home.
You will not lay your hands on it!

333674.<pipipi_high>「けがらわしき獣の 分際で\n 主神たる わたくしに:
<pipipi_high>A filthy beast defy me, the Almighty?
Your arrogance truly knows no bounds.

333675.<pipipi_high>「……そうだわ。\n 果ての大地ゼニアスを 滅ぼすなら:
<pipipi_high>
That's right... If I am to destroy this land,
then I shall do it with power worthy to
be called Almighty.

333677.「祝え！ ゼニアスの民よ 大地よ！！:
Rejoice, people of Zeniath! The people
of this land!

333678.「我が名は 創失の主神ゼネシア……\n 果ての大地ゼニアスの天地が 待ちわびた\:
I am Zenethia, the Unmighty.
Zeniath has long awaited an all-knowing and
all-powerful being such as I!

333679.「だまれ！ ねえさまのフリを するなっ！\n ねえさまは おまえに……創失を招く:
Shut up! You are not her! Sister lost to
you... She's gone! She's never coming back!

333680.「愚かな番犬と 知ってはいたけれど\n わたくしが 誰なのかも わからないとは。:
I already knew you were a lowly lapdog, but
this? Not even remembering who I am?
How utterly despicable.

333681.「いやしき獣よ。その心根に ふさわしい\n 無力な姿に おなりなさい。:
Become the helpless form that befits your
wretched heart, you vile beast.

333684.「……命までは 奪いませんよ。\n お前には 大切な故郷が 滅びゆくさまを\n:
I will spare your life. You should witness the
destruction of your precious homeland
firsthand.

333685.「はるか いにしえに 滅びし者どもよ。\n 創失の主神ゼネシアの名において\n:
Hear me, thee who perished in ages past!
In the name of the Unmade Almighty, I create
your existence once more...

333686.「世界を 血と恐怖に染めた いまわしき帝国。\n 欲にまみれた人間の 愚かしさが:
The accursed empire that drenched the world in both blood and terror... The castle born from human folly, steeped in greed... Awaken once
again!

333687.「父が もっとも嫌った 醜き人間どもの典型よ！\n わが下僕となりて\n 果ての:
The epitome of wretched humans that my father
most despised! Become my servants, and
destroy Zeniath!

333690.「新たな主神より 果ての大地ゼニアスに\n 滅びという名の祝福を 与えようぞ。:
I shall bestow upon this land a blessingー
a blessing of destruction.

333691.「あいつは……\n ねえさまの神獣 ゼナベスティア！\n じ…じゃあ おまえは:
That's...that's Sister's divine beast,
Zenebestia! Then, you really are...

333692.「……お行きなさい。\n ゼニアスに巣くいし 愚かなる生き物たちを\n ひとり残:
Go forth, and eliminate every last one of
these foolish creatures that infect Zeniath!

333693.「お願いだ ねえさま！\n とうさまの王冠と 王笏を かえして！\n 創生のチカ:
Sister, please! Give back Father's Scepter
and Crown! You can't use the power of
creation like this!

333694.「主神に指図するとは なんと しつけの悪い。\n ……おだまりなさい。:
To think you can give orders to the
Almighty... How very crude. Be silent.

333695.「ゼニアスの民を 守りたいなら\n その者たちを 倒してごらんなさい。:
If you wish to protect Zeniath's people, then
you'd do well to defeat them.

333696.「……できるものなら ですけれど。: ...If you think you can, that is.

333698.「ここは 我にまかせろ！\n そなたは あの ゼネシアを追え！\n やつを 倒す:
Leave them to me! You must go after Zenethia
and stop her!

333699.「ラキには なにもできない……。\n ……ラキは ゼニアスを 守れない……！:
Lycae can do nothing...
Lycae cannot protect Zeniath...!

333700.「<pc>と ポルテ……ふたりは強い。\n でも いくら強くても ゼニアスの町\:
<pc> and Porte...they're strong.
But it doesn't matter...there's no way
they can protect everyone alone...

333701.「今こそ ゼニアスを 守るものが必要なのに！\n ラキには……なにも……。:
Zeniath needs someone to protect itーnow
more than ever! But Lycae...he can't...

333703.「誰のおかげで 飛べているか 覚えてらして？:
Do you remember who it was that allowed you
to fly here?

333705.<center>あなたは まだ 死ぬべきではありません\nさあ 私のもとへ……:
It is not yet your time...
Please, come to me...

333707.<center>目覚めたようですね\n<pc>……新世界の守り人よ:
You've awoken, <pc>...
Guardian of this new world...

333708.<center>私は 雨の中の幻……\nこの島から 果ての大地ゼニアスを\n見つ:
I am but an illusion within this rain...
I have continued to watch over this island
and Zeniath alike.

333709.<center>あなたは 創失の主神を名乗る\nあの 哀しき魂のことが\n知りた:
You wish to know about that poor soul?
The one who calls herself Almighty of
Unmaking?

333710.<center>創失を招くものは 強大なチカラを求め\n女神の命を奪い その魂を:
The being called That Which Unmakes sought immense power, and in doing so took the life and soul of the goddess. But such a mighty
power was much too strong for him to bear.

333711.<center>亡き女神の魂と かの者の魂とは せめぎあい……\nいまや 創失を:
Both the souls of the late goddess and That Which Unmakes...they clashed. And now, the one whose will is in control is that of
the goddess.

333712.<center>それゆえ 創失の主神と名乗る 哀しき魂は\nゼニアスに 牙を剥い:
Hence, that sorrowful soul who claims that
awful title has bared her fangs toward
Zeniath.

333713.<center><pc>……\nあなたは かつて 私を甦らせた\n懐かしき天使を:
<pc>... You remind me of an angel
who once revived me. They were strong
and kind, just like you.

333714.<center>されど いかな勇士であろうとも\nたったひとりでは 世界のすべて:
However...no matter how courageous, a single
person cannot hope to protect the entire
world by their lonesome.

333715.<center>あなたに これを 授けましょう……: And so, I bestow upon you this...

333717.<center>助けを求める人々のもとへ 向かうのです\nそうして その 祈りの:
Go to those who need aid, and collect their
crystallized gratitudeーtheir
Benevolessenceーinto that fruit.

333718.<center>星のオーラが 祈りの果実に満ちたとき\n目覚めし者たちが\nあな:
When the fruit is filled with Benevolessence,
they will awaken and lend you their
strength...

333719.<center>創失の主神を 追うには\n空を飛べねば 不自由でしょう\n私から:
Pursuing the Unmighty will prove difficult
without the ability to fly... Allow me to
grant you a small fragment of my power.

333720.なんと ゼニアスの空に 霊子が復活した！\n聖天のつばさで 飛べるようになった。:
The spirit specks have returned to the skies
of Zeniath! You may now fly with the
Wonderwing once more.<me 71>

333721.<center><pc>\nあなたを呼ぶ声が 聞こえます:
<pc>...
There is a voice calling out to you.

333724.「結晶の海は すべての生命を拒む。\n あの上に落ちたら 二度と助からない。\n:
The crystallized sea kills all living things. Falling into it means no coming back...but Lycae believed you were still alive. He kept
looking for you...

333726.「ねえさまに チカラを奪われたから\n ラキには もう 戦うチカラが ない。:
Lycae no longer has the strength to fight
after Sister took his power.

333727.「襲ってきたやつらは\n ポルテが やっつけてくれたけど……\n あいつらは い:
Porte was able to stop the ones that came
after us... But they just keep coming back.

333728.「あちこちを いっぺんに 襲われたら\n ポルテだけじゃ みんなを守れない……。:
If they keep attacking like this, then Porte
won't be able to save everyone...

333729.「……ラキは ばかで 役立たずだ。\n こんなときに いい方法が 浮かばない。\:
Lycae is a fool and useless.
He can't even think of what to do.
He can do nothing...

333730.<pc>は ラキに\nふしぎな島で 祈りの果実を もらったこと……:
<pc> gives Lycae the
Ambrorison they received on the mysterious
island...

333731.人々を助ければ 祈りの果実に 星のオーラが満ち\nゼニアスを救う者が 目覚めるか:
They explain that if the fruit is filled with the Benevolessence of the people they help, then someone may awaken who can save
Zeniath!

333732.「わかった！\n みんなを救って 星のオーラを集める！\n <pc> チカラを貸:
Okay! We have to help everyone and get their
Benevolessence! Please help!

333734.「ポルテが はじまりの地で 待ってる。\n 早く戻って このことを 教えよう！:
Porte is waiting for us at the Land of
Beginnings. Let's go back and tell her
about this!

333735.「三下ふぜいが 調子に乗るな！: Worthless cretin! Don't think you can win!

333736.「みんな 逃げてっ！: You all need to run, now!

333737.「まずいな……。\n このまま 数で押されたら とても保たん。:
This is bad... If they overwhelm us with sheer
numbers, then we won't last for much longer.

333738.「ゼネシアめ。\n 大盤振る舞いが すぎるぞ……！:
Zenethia, you fiend!
You think yourself so generous!

333741.「よう <pc>。\n めずらしく 苦戦してるようじゃねえか。:
Hey there, <pc>.
I see you're struggling a bit. That's not
like you.

333743.「君たちが 僕の相手を してくれるのかな？: So you'd like to take me on too, then?

333745.「燈火の調査隊 あらため\n ……燈火の防衛隊 集合っ！！:
You are the Ember Explorers no more...
Ember Defenders, assemble!

333746.「総員 これより ゼニアス防衛任務に\n あたってください！:
All members! From this moment, your mission
is the protection of Zeniath!

333747.「ポルテ君に ゼニアスの危機だと忠告を受け\n これは 一大事だと直感し 急いで:
When Porte told me that Zeniath was in danger,
I knew it was something I couldn't ignore. So,
I hurried back to Astoltia to gather everyone.

333748.「みなさん 忙しい身で ありながら\n ゼニアスのためならばと 快諾してくれて。:
Everyone is quite busy with their lives, but
they all agreed to help for Zeniath's sake.
I am truly grateful...

333749.「現在 ゼニアスを襲った魔物どもは\n よみがえった 女神ゼネシアの しもべ。:
The monsters attacking Zeniath now serve
under the revived Zenethia.

333750.「ゼネシアは ムニエカの東……\n 結晶の海の向こうに\n 新たな大陸……ガナン:
And east of Munieka, beyond the crystalline
seaーZenethia created a new continent...
where the Gittish Empire rises again.

333751.「結晶の海は 人や 船どころか\n 聖天のつばさすら拒む 絶対の防壁。\n こち:
That sea not only rejects people and ships,
but your Wonderwing too. It's the perfect
barrier. We cannot hope to strike from here...

333752.「ゼネシア側は あの光球を 飛ばして\n ゼニアス全土へ 魔物どもを\n いくら:
It appears Zenethia has the ability to launch
those orbs of light, and in doing so can send
as many monsters as she wishes across Zeniath.

333753.「はじまりの地を襲った あの連中が\n ゼニアス全土に！？:
You mean to tell me that the ones who attacked
us here are now all across Zeniath?!

333754.「防衛隊のみなさんが おのおの 調査した地へ\n 向かう手はずに なっていますが:
I've arranged to send our defense force
members to the areas they each explored...
But can they fight back such a massive army?

333755.<pc>は ふたりに\nゼニアスを救うため 各地で\n星のオーラを 集める必要が:
<pc> explains that they must collect
Benevolessence in order to save Zeniath!

333756.「ならば 星のオーラを 集めるためにも\n よろこんで 手助けするとしよう。\n:
Then I'd gladly lend a hand in collecting
it. Is that acceptable?

333757.「ありがとうございます！\n ではまず 敵地に ほど近い\n ムニエカの町へ 応:
Thank you for your help! First, I'd have you
go to Munieka to lend your support. The
enemy's territory is closest to there.

333758.「のんびりしている暇はない。\n <pc> 行くぞ！: There's no time for rest. Let's go!

333759.「傷だらけで チカラを失った そなたは\n 足手まといだ。\n 悪いが 連れてい:
You're wounded and lost your strength, so
you'd just slow us down. Sorry, but you
can't come along.

333762.「話せば長くなるのだが……こいつは ラキだ。\n 現在 ゼニアスを苦しめている:
This is Lycae. It's a long story, but the
one who currently torments Zeniath is
who made him this way.

333763.「……なんと いたましい。\n ラキ君。気を落とさないでください。\n きっと:
How awful... Please don't lose heart, Lycae.
Everyone will restore things to how they
were. I'm sure of it.

333764.「それでは おふたりとも\n ムニエカの町を お願いしましたよ！:
Now then... Please make your way to
Munieka!

333765.「あたしたち……今まで 何を……？\n 悪い夢を 見ていたような……。:
What were...we all doing just now...?
It was like a really bad dream...

333766.「あっ ナブレットおじちゃーん！\n ねえねえ サーカスの芸 みーせーてー！:
Oh, it's Mr. Nablette! Come on!
I wanna see your circus act!!

333767.「よかった……！\n 町のみなさん 正気を取り戻したようです。:
What a relief... Everyone's come to their
senses.

333768.「ったく ヒヤヒヤしたぜ！\n ……お前らの おかげだな。:
Sheesh, talk about a close call!
It's all thanks to them, huh?

333769.「……俺たちが おかしくなっていたこと\n うっすらとだけど 覚えているよ。\n:
I vaguely remember that we started acting
strange... You helped us again, right?

333770.「いつか 終わりのときがくるのは わかってる。\n だけど エドアルドさんがくれ:
I know that this life of mine will come to
an end someday...but not like that. Especially
the one Eduardo gave to me.

333771.「俺たちは 残りの人生を 笑って生きていくよ。\n ムニエカの町を 救ってくれて:
We'll keep on living, full of smiles and
laughter! Thank you so much for saving
Munieka yet again!

333772.<center>助けを求める人々のもとへ 向かうのです\nそうして その 祈りの:
Go to those who need aid, and collect their
Benevolessence into that fruit.

333773.<center>星のオーラが 祈りの果実に満ちたとき\n目覚めし者たちが\nあな:
When the fruit is filled with Benevolessence,
they will awaken and lend you their
strength...

333774.「守護天使ルーミリアが 消え\n 町を守る者が いなくなったのを狙って\n 仕掛:
Targeting the town when Lumeria isn't here
to protect it anymore? Talk about low...

333775.「みずから 主神を 名乗りながら\n その目的は ゼニアスを滅ぼすこととは……\:
How could you call yourself Almighty but
plot to destroy Zeniath? It's unacceptable.

333776.「俺たちは はじまりの地に戻って\n ムニエカで何があったか 報告しとくぜ。\n:
We'll head back to the Land of Beginnings and
report what happened here. You two should
go and support the others.

333777.「アマラーク城は 守りも堅いはずです。\n 次は メネト村の応援に 向かわれては:
Amarak Castle should be well fortified...so
why not head to Menet Village next?
We'll see the two of you soon.

333778.「よし。メネト村へ 出発だ！: Alright. We head for Menet Village!

333779.「村を 襲ってきた連中か。\n ……邪魔は させないよ！:
Are they the ones who attacked the village?
You won't get in our way!

333780.「おいおい。ここは 用心棒の見せ場だぜ。\n オレに まかしとけ！:
Hey, now. It's the bodyguard's time to shine.
I'll take care of 'em!

333781.アスバルとヒューザの連携で\nヤドリギ広場を襲ってきた 魔物たちは\nまたたくま:
With Asbal and Hyuza's teamwork, the
monsters attacking the Mistletoe Plaza
were quickly quelled.

333782.「コッケン様も 無事だったようだね。\n それじゃ……いくよ？:
Cuckoo seems to be safe now.
Shall we try, then?

333783.アスバルが 祝福の残光を 捧げると\nアスバルの魔法陣から まばゆい光が あふれ:
As Asbal offers the Blessed Afterglow to the
magic circle, a dazzling light erupts from
its center, enveloping the Cuckoo entirely!

333786.「コッケン様と <pc>さんたちが\n 私たちを 目覚めさせてくれたんだね……。: You all woke us up again, didn't you?

333788.「くわーっ よう寝たわい！\n お前さんたちには 世話になったのう。\n 来年の:
Whew...I slept like a log! Thanks again for
everything you've done for us. I hope to
see you at next year's festival!

333789.「来年の コッケン祭り……か。\n じいさんとの約束を 守れるかどうかは\n オ:
Next year's festival, huh...
Whether or not we can keep that promise
is up to us.

333790.「コッケン様の祝福を帯びた 魔法陣が\n しばらくは 邪悪なものから 村を守るは:
The magic circle along with Cuckoo's blessing should keep evil at bay for a while. Those monsters are bound to come in droves,
though...

333791.「海のむこうに現れた ガナン帝国とやらの\n 親玉を なんとかしなきゃ\n キリ:
We've gotta do something about the big boss
of that Gittish Empire of whatever it is...
Otherwise, this'll never end.

333792.「……ご明察。\n ところが 結晶化した海が 厄介でね。\n 僕の転移魔法でも:
Yes, exactly. However, that crystallized
sea... Even my teleportation magic can't
cross it.

333793.「今後の襲撃に 備えつつ\n なんとか ガナン帝国へ 潜入する方法を\n 模索す:
While we prepare for what's to come, we'll
also need to find some way to get inside
the Gittish Empire.

333794.「そういうのは 賢い魔王サマに 任せた！\n オレは メネト村に あの連中が\n:
I'll leave THAT sort of thing to our wise
Demon King here. As for me, I'll stay here
to make sure they don't attack again.

333795.「……てことで オレたちは いったん\n はじまりの地に 報告に戻る。<pc>。:
So, for now...we'll head back to the Land of
Beginnings to report what happened. You
guys will go to Amarak Castle, yeah?

333796.「ジーガンフが お待ちかねだ。\n オレから よろしくと言っといてくれ。\n …:
Jiganf should be waiting for you, then.
Give him my regards, would you?
Later.

333797.「敵は どんな手を使ってくるか わからない。\n 油断は禁物だよ <pc>。\n:
There's no telling what kind of tricks our
enemy may use, so keep your wits about you.
I'll see you all later.

333799.「はじまりの地に現れた 兵隊どもが\n よみがえった フーラズーラを従えて\n:
The soldiers that attacked us before showed
up here, along with the Fluzula!

333800.「ここは オレたちが！\n <cs_pchero>は 城の防衛に向かってくれ！:
I'll take care of things here!
Go and defend the castle!

333802.「……ここは 任せた！: Take care of them for me!

333803.「こいつは 少々 手こずりそうだな。\n ともに戦わせてくれ <cs_pcher:
This one looks to be no pushover.
Allow me to fight with you!

333804.「アマラークが槍 イルシーム……\n 推して参る！:
I am Ilseem, the spear of Amarak!
I will charge forth!

333806.「……悪しき者どもは 去った！\n またしても アマラークのために戦ってくれた\:
Those wicked beings are gone!
You have once again lent a hand for the
safety of Amarak. To Sir Jiganf...

333807.「勇敢なる客人 <cs_pchero>殿に\n 心からの感謝を 捧げよう！:
...and to our courageous guest, <cs_pchero>!
We offer you our most heartfelt gratitude!

333808.「……思えば <cs_pchero>\n お前とは 刃を交えたことこそあるが\n:
Come to think of it... Although we have
crossed blades before, this is the first time
we've fought side by side.

333809.「こんな事態だというのに\n <cs_pchero>の戦いぶりには 胸が躍ったよ:
In spite of everything, I was quite thrilled
to see how you fight. A shame you'll be
returning home to Astoltia...

333810.「そうだ アマラークに 移住する気はないか？\n お前が来てくれるというなら 屋:
That's it! You are welcome to move here to
Amarak. I'm certain that Rizk would be more
than happy to accommodate you.

333811.「……勝手に <cs_pchero>を スカウトするな。:
...Don't think you can recruit <if_woman>her<else>him<elseif>
just like that.

333812.「む……それは 失礼した。\n 次からは 事前に ジーガンフの許可を取ろう。:
Ah... My apologies. I'll be sure to ask for
your permission next time.

333814.「ゼニアスから 悪しき者どもを駆逐するには\n 今しばらく 時間が かかりそうだ:
It'll take some time to drive the evil out
completely from Zeniath. Are we fine to
trust you with Amarak?

333815.「ああ。<cs_pchero> お前たちは\n 助けを求める人々のもとへ 向かっ:
Yes. You should go to those who need help
more than we do.

333816.「……しかし これで はじまりの地と\n ゼニアスの３つの町は 守り切ったようだ:
But with this...we've protected the Land of
Beginnings and the three settlements of
Zeniath. We can finally rest easy now.

333817.「いや。そなたらが 勝利した直後 例の光球が\n 聖湖ゼニートの方角へ 飛んでい:
No, we can't. Just after our victory, I
noticed orbs of light headed towards Zenit.
We must go there immediately.

333819.「ここは 引き受けた！\n <pc>は 双子たちの家へ！:
I'll handle things there.
Go, find the twins!

333820.「こ……子どもには 手を出すなっ！: I...I won't let you hurt them!

333824.「メレちーが 言ってたとおり！\n 隊長は 世界中の誰よりも 強いんだねっ！:
Merry was right! You really ARE the
strongest!

333826.「湖から 創生のチカラが……！？:
The power of creation... Coming from the
lake?!

333828.<center>その果実を ウォルドの聖簾へ……: Bring that fruit to the falls of Angelfall...

333829.<center>ウォルドの守護天使 マギエル様の像に\n女神の果実を 捧げるのだ:
Offer the Fygg to the statue of Magiel,
Guardian Angel. The time has come to
signal their revival!

333830.<pc>が集めた 星のオーラで\n祈りの果実は 実り 女神の果実になった！:
With the Benevolessence <pc> has
collected, the Ambrorison ripens into the
Fygg!

333831.「でかしたぞ <pc>！\n 守護天使マギエルの像へ\n 女神の果実を 持ってい:
<pc>, you've done it!
We need to bring the fruit to the
statue of Magiel!

333833.<center>新たな主神の願いにより\n我らは 今ひとたび 生を授からん:
By the desire of our new Almighty, we are
once again given life.

333834.<center>目覚めよ……\nバトラエル トープス ルーミリア リムネル\n果:
Batrael... Tohpes... Lumeria... Rimnel...
Guardian Angels of Zeniathーawaken!

333835.<center>我ら５人 新たな主神とともに\nゼニアスを 守らん！:
With the will of our new Almighty, we five
shall protect Zeniath!

333836.「控えよ！ いまいましい 羽虫どもめ……。\n 新たな主神 ゼネシアの御前である:
Stand down! Accursed gnats... You stand
before your new Almighty, Zenethia!

333837.「……へっ。笑わせんなって。\n ゼニアス中 滅茶苦茶にしやがった 不良娘が\n:
Heh... Don't make me laugh. You tear Zeniath
to shreds, and now you want to pretend
to be Almighty?

333838.「ゼニアスの大地は オマエを 受け容れない。\n とっとと くたばって あの世で:
Zeniath will never accept you. Why don't you just hurry up and eat dirt already? Oh, and go apologize to your old man while you're down
there.

333839.「ならば いかなる者が ゼニアスを治める？\n 父グランゼニスが 死んだことは\:
Then who will rule Zeniath?
As you already know, my father is dead...

333840.「愚妹ルティアナは とうに 息絶え\n 継承者グランゼニスは 石と化した。\n:
My sister Lutiana is dead as well...and my
only heir has been turned to stone. I am
the only one fit to rule this land!

333841.「あー そう思いてぇんなら\n それで いーんじゃねえのぉ？:
Well, if that's what you really think...
Then sure, go right ahead.

333843.「真の主神の継承に 必要なる神器は ３つ！\n 主神の王冠 主神の王笏\n そし:
There are three divine artifacts necessary to
become Almightyーthe Crown, the Scepter...
and the Orb of Succession.

333844.「オマエが 父親を殺してまで ほしがった\n 大事な大事な オーブだ。\n ……:
That oh-so-precious orbーthe one you wanted
so badly you killed your own father for it.
I'm sure you remember that QUITE well.

333845.「継承者のオーブは すでに\n ゼニアスの大地に存在している！\n オレたちが:
The Orb of Succession is already here in
Zeniath! Our being here is proof of that!

333846.「チカラで 世界を征服したところで\n 継承者のオーブがなけりゃ ただの簒奪者。:
Without the Orb, you're just some usurper,
taking what you want by force. Those who
hold the Orb are destined to destroy you!

333847.「おのれ……！ 不敬であろう！！: Why, you...! You dare disrespect me?!

333848.「おっと！ オレを 消し飛ばしちまえば\n 継承者のオーブのありか……\n 永遠:
Don't be too hasty now! If you blow me away,
then you'll never know where the Orb really
is...

333849.「オーブのありかを 教えよ。\n さすれば 命ばかりは 助けてやろう。:
You WILL tell me where the Orb is.
Do so, and I will spare your life.

333850.「やなこった！\n だーれが オマエみてえな 嘘つきの\n 約束なんざぁ 信じる:
Not a chance! Who in their right mind would
trust the promises of a liar like you?

333851.「ゼニアス中 ほじくり返して 探してみろよ？\n ま 万年反抗期の ワガママ娘に:
Go ahead, dig all over Zeniath if you really
want. Not like a rebellious spoiled brat like
you'd find it anyway, though...

333852.「そういえば 守護天使も わずかばかり\n 創生のチカラを 宿していましたね。\:
Ah, that's right...even the Guardian Angels possess a small amount of the power of creation. But how long will that last, I
wonder...?

333853.「王冠と王笏……２つの神器を 手にした\n わたくしのチカラは 無限！:
With both the Crown and Scepter in my
grasp...my power is limitless!

333854.「あなたがたが チカラ尽き 消え果てた後\n ゼニアスの民が いかなる運命を た:
After your strength is exhausted and you
vanish completely, what fate will befall the
people of Zeniath? Think QUITE carefully...

333855.「猶予を あげましょう。: I will give you some time to think.

333856.「継承者のオーブを 献上なさい。\n そうすれば 無益な血は 流しません。:
Present the Orb to me. Do that, and no
unnecessary blood will need to be shed.

333857.「ガナン帝国城へ 戻ります。\n ……わたくし 待たされるのは 嫌いなの。\n:
I will return to the Gittingham Palace. I
don't like to be kept waiting, you know...so
you'd best hurry.

333858.「……なんとか 追い払えたか。:
So, I guess we managed to get her off our
back somehow.

333859.「……かーっ！\n せっかく イケメンに 戻れたってのに\n まーた 厄介なこと:
Maaaan! Just when I'm back to my handsome
looking self again, things just have to go and
get all hectic, huh...

333860.「ゼネシアめ……しぶといヤローだぜ。\n 王冠と王笏を 手に入れた上に\n 憎っ:
That Zenethia...she's a persistent one! Not
only did she get the Crown and Scepter,
but now she's annoyingly powerful, too!

333861.「創生された しもべどもなら\n オレたち守護天使でも防げるが ゼネシアに\n:
The Guardian Angels'll have no problems with those created servants of hers...but if Zenethia herself comes after us, she could
wipe out an entire town if she really tries.

333862.「あの不良娘が 継承者のオーブほしさに\n 大人しくしてるうちに 今度こそ\n:
That spoiled brat is behaving herself now
while she waits for the Orb. We've got no
choice but to put her down for good.

333863.「あやつが そこまでして 求める\n 継承者のオーブとは いったい なんなのだ？:
What exactly is this Orb of Succession that
she seeks so desperately?

333864.「真の主神の座を 継承するため必要となる\n ３つの神器のうち\n もっとも 重:
As far as the divine artifacts go, it's the
most important one of the three needed
to become Almighty.

333865.「主神の王冠 主神の王笏も\n 人智を超えたチカラを 有しているが\n 継承者の:
Both the Crown and Scepter are no joke either. They too hold a power far beyond mortal understanding...but the Orb is the most
powerful of them all.

333866.「……ゼネシアが 過去に戻ってまで\n オーブを奪おうとしたのも そのためだ。\:
And that's why she traveled back in time to
get it. But she ended up getting beaten.

333867.「さきほど そなたは\n 継承者のオーブのありかを 知っていると\n 言っておっ:
You said earlier that you know where the
Orb is. Where is it, then?

333868.「あー すまん。ありゃあ ハッタリだ！\n オーブのありかなんて 知らねーヨ。:
Ah, sorry... That was just some bluff.
I don't ACTUALLY know where it is...

333869.「継承者のオーブは ゼニアスの大地が\n 認めた者のもとだけに 現れ\n チカラ:
The Orb appears only to those that the land
of Zeniath itself recognizes. It's impossible
to obtain with one's own power.

333870.「オーブは すでに 次なる主神を定め\n ゼニアスのどこかで 目覚めたはずだ。\:
It must have already decided on the new
Almighty and awakened somewhere in Zeniath.
I can feel its presence within the land...

333871.「ま オーブのチカラは あてにすんな！\n オーブ自身が 使われるべき時を選ぶそ:
Well, you shouldn't count on its power anyway! They say the Orb chooses when it should be used. Who knows, it's possible we're all wiped
out before it even has a chance to show up!

333872.「……時間稼ぎにしか ならんというわけか。: ...So it's just a way for us to buy time?

333873.「ポジティブに いこうぜ～？\n オーブが手に入るまで 総攻撃は まずない。\n:
Let's all stay positive, okay? Nothing serious
will happen until we get the Orb. Buying
some time is a win for us, wouldn't you say?

333874.「……それに 奥の手なら\n まだ ちゃーんと 残ってるサ。:
...And besides, if it comes to itーwe still
have a trick or two left up our sleeve.

333875.「ルティアナちゃんの 旅立ちにあたり\n じいさんは愛しい娘に ふたつの贈り物を:
As sweet Lutiana set out on her journey, the
old man gave his beloved daughter two gifts.
One was the Crown. As for the other...

333877.「犯した罪とともに 神を裁き\n その魂を斬り捨てる……神殺しの剣。:
A sword that judges gods of their sins, and
cleaves in two their very souls.

333878.「数万年の時を経て ルティアナちゃんと\n その眷属……誓約の子が 帰還したとき:
After tens of thousands of years, when Lutiana and her Children of the Covenant were to return... If Zenethia hadn't changed her ways,
then...

333879.「断罪の剣にて 罪深き女神ゼネシアを 斬れ。\n じいさんは その願いをこめて\:
She would slay the sinful Zenethia with the
Sword. That is the wish the old man entrusted
to her.

333880.「頼む。アストルティアから 断罪の剣を\n 持ってきてくれ！ あの剣ならば\n:
Pleaseーyou have to bring the Sword of
Atonement here! It can defeat her without
us needing the Orb!

333881.「断罪の剣を 手に入れたなら\n 結晶の海を越え ガナン帝国城へ至る道を\n す:
If you bring it to me, then I will cut a path
for you to cross the crystalline sea, straight
to the Gittingham Palace!

333883.「断罪の剣を受け継いだ グランゼニス神は\n 誓約の園で 剣とともに 石にされて:
The heir to the Sword, Gran Zenith, has been
turned to stone along with it. That was
Zenethia's doing...

333884.「クソッ！ ここで詰みかよ……。: Damn it! Is there no other way...?!

333885.「私ぬきで 世界を救おうだなんて\n 水くさいじゃない。<pc>！:
Trying to save the world without me,
<pc>? How cold of you!

333886.「はじめまして 天使さま。\n 私は グランゼドーラ第一王女にして\n 当代の勇:
A pleasure to meet you, great angel.
I am AnluciaーPrincess of Gran Zedora
and the Hero of this age.

333887.「人間の神 グランゼニスさまから\n そのチカラを 授かった血族の末裔です。:
My bloodline has been granted its power by
Gran Zenith, the god of humans.

333888.「グランゼニスさまを 石化から 救うため\n 何を為すべきかは 神獣ファルシオン:
Falchion here has told me what I must do to
save him from his petrification. You can
leave the rest to me!

333889.「まだ 花もつぼみの お嬢ちゃんだ。\n いくら 勇者に 生まれついたからって\:
You're just a little girl... Even if you were
born as Hero, there's no way I can let you
put yourself in that kind of danger...

333891.「……準備ができたら 誓約の園へ来な。\n 石化した グランゼニス神とともに\n:
When you're ready, come to the Grounds of
the Covenant. I will be waiting for you there.

333892.「つもる話も あるだろう。\n 先に はじまりの地へ 戻っている。:
We've a lot to discuss. I'll go on ahead to
the Land of Beginnings.

333893.「<pc>。あなたが旅した この世界を\n 空から よく ながめてみたいの。\n:
I want to get a good look of this world from
the sky. Shall we head to the Land of
Beginnings together?

333895.「ここが 果ての大地 ゼニアス……。\n 女神ルティアナさまが\n その 生を受:
This is Zeniath... The place where Lutiana's
life began.

333896.「ジア・クト念晶体に 襲われる前は\n もっと 美しい世界だったのでしょうね。:
I'm sure it was much more beautiful before
the Dia Kut attacked.

333897.「私も 一緒に 冒険したかったな。\n 仕方のないこととはいえ 調査隊のみなさん:
I really wish I could've gone on this adventure with you. I know it's pointless to complain about now, but I'm a bit jealous
of the Ember Explorers...

333898.「あなたは いかなる場所 いかなる世界でも\n 人々の希望となり 平和をもたらす:
No matter the place, no matter the world...
You become a beacon of hope and bring peace
to all. That's why everyone believes in you.

333899.「もちろん いちばん信じてるのは 私だけど。:
Of course, I'M the one who believes in you
most.

333900.「私ね <pc>……。\n ゼニアスへ来る途中 考えていたことがあるの。:
I...had a thought when I made my way here to
Zeniath.

333901.「勇者の盟友として あなたが いるんじゃなくて\n いくつもの世界を救った <p:
I'm not here because of the Hero and Ally...
I'm here as your friend... A friend that's
saved countless worlds.

333902.「長きにわたる 魔界との戦いが終わりを告げ\n 魔王を倒す勇者としての\n 私た:
The long battle against the Demon World has come to an end, and with no Demon King to defeat, the role of Hero is no
longer necessary...

333903.「だから 今度は あなたの冒険を\n 私が 助ける番。:
So...it's my turn to help you on your
adventure this time.

333904.「グランゼニスさまの石化を 解く方法を\n シオンさまが 調べてくださったの。:
Shion has been searching for a way to break
Gran Zenith's petrification.

333905.「勇者としての 私のチカラ……\n かつて はじまりの勇者に与えられた\n その:
My power as Hero...the power that began
with the first Hero...I will give it back.

333906.「そうすれば グランゼニスさまは みずから\n 石化の術を打ち破り 元に戻れるは:
With that, Gran Zenith should be able to
break free from his petrification and return
to normal.

333907.「ゼニスの封宮で 守護天使たちは\n この世界の主神を 目覚めさせるため\n 消:
Within the Palace of Zenith, the Guardian
Angels gave themselves up to awaken the
Almighty of this world, yes? It's the same...

333908.「ただし 私ひとりで やらせてほしいの。: But... I want to do it by myself.

333909.「<pc>は アストルティアだけでなく\n このゼニアスをも救う 唯一の光。\n:
You're the only hope of not just Astoltia, but
Zeniath too. Unlike me, my battle against
the Demon King finished...

333910.「大丈夫！ 死ぬつもりはないわ。\n けれど これからの戦いのためには\n <p:
Don't worry! I have no intention of losing my
life. But for the battles ahead, your power
is indispensable...

333911.「万にひとつも <pc>が\n チカラを失うことは あってはならない……。\n:
There isn't even a one-in-thousand chance
you'll lose that power... Right?

333912.「私を信じて 任せてくれるわよね。\n ……<pc>。<yesno><close:
You trust me, and will leave it to me,
right?<yesno><close>

333913.「グランゼニスさまが 石にされてしまった\n 誓約の園は はじまりの地にある\n:
I heard that you can reach the Grounds of the
Covenant via an islet near the Land of
Beginnings.

333914.「私は 小島で待っているから\n <pc>も あとで 来てちょうだい。\n 誓約:
I'll make my way to the islet and wait there.
We can go to the Grounds of the Covenant
together.

333915.「……すぐそばで 見守っていてほしいから。:
I want you to be by my side, and watch over
me...

333917.「新世界アストルティアの勇者 アンルシアよ。\n ……その勇気 忘れまい。:
Anlucia, Hero of the new world of Astoltia...
Your courage will not be forgotten.

333919.「主神グランゼニスの愛し子 女神ルティアナ……\n その末子 グランゼニス神よ。:
O precious child of the Almighty, Lutiana, and
her youngest of children, Gran Zenith...

333920.「悪しき呪縛によりて 石と化したる魂よ\n ……我が声に 応えたまえ。:
To the soul turned to stone by a wicked
curse... Listen well, and heed my voice.

333921.「遠き日 はじまりの勇者に授けたる祝福は\n 勇者アンルシアのうちに 宿りたり。:
The blessing given to the Hero of days long
past now dwells within Anlucia. By that
power... Gran Zenith, rise once more!

333922.「グランゼニスさまが 私たち血族に\n 授けてくださった 勇者のチカラ……:
The power of the Hero that was bestowed upon
our bloodline...

333923.「すべて お返しします……！: We return all of itーto you!

333926.「彼女の命と 引き替えに\n グランゼニス神は甦り ゼニアスは救われる。\n …:
In exchange for her life, Gran Zenith would be
revived, and Zeniath would know salvation.
Anlucia told me not to speak of it...

333927.「ゼニアスへ向かうと 決めた時から\n 何もかも 決めていたそうです……。:
Her mind was already made up the moment
she decided to come here...

333928.「年端もゆかぬ娘に 命を捨てさせて\n 何が 救いだ！？:
You call that "salvation"?! Letting such a
young girl just throw her life away?!

333929.「……すまぬ。そなたのほうが\n よほど つらいはずだな。:
...Sorry. You must all be hurting much more
than I am.

333951.<center>お～っ！ 無事 ガナン帝国領に\n着いたみてえだな さっすが オ:
Oh-ho! Looks like you made it to the Gittish
Empire in one piece! Man, I'm good!

333952.<center>そこの 青い木に触れれば\n誓約の園と行き来できっから 覚えとき:
Touch that blue tree and you'll be back to
the Grounds of the Covenant in a flash.
Don't forget, alright?

333953.<center>ゼネシアは ガナン帝国城に いるはずだ\n誓約の子<pc> グラ:
Zenethia should be inside the Gittingham
Palace. We're counting on you to clean up
the old man's mess!

333956.「ゼネシアめ……。\n 主神気取りで 城まで創生しおって。:
That Zenethia... Acting as Almighty and going
so far as to create this castle.

333957.「アストルティアの化身である君は\n 私を グラさんと呼んだ あの少女と\n 同:
The embodiment of Astoltia... You are one and
the same as that girl that called me "Mr.
Gran", right?

333958.「彼女は ずいぶん 女神ゼネシアに懐いていた。\n 記憶や感情の共有が あるなら:
She had quite the strong attachment to
Zenethia. Won't there be trouble with your
shared memories and emotions?

333959.「ああ……すべて 把握している。\n かの女神が いかにして弟子を籠絡し\n あ:
Yes... I am aware. I remember perfectly how
that goddess wrapped my disciple around
her finger and manipulated her.

333960.「創失を招くものとして よみがえった\n 女神ゼネシア。やつだけは 許さん……！:
Zenethia has been reborn as That Which
Unmakes... She will not be forgiven!

333961.「弟子の魂を 眠らせている間に\n 今度こそ 完全に 葬り去ってくれるわ！:
While my disciple sleeps, I will make sure
that not a trace of her remains!

333962.「死んだ女神と 同じ姿をした怪物だとしても\n もうひとりの君に 戦わせるのは酷:
Even if it is just a monster taking on the goddess' form, it would be cruel to make the other you fight. So you decided to
let her soul sleep while you did all the dirty work.

333964.「いまだ ゼネシアの死を信じられぬ バカ弟子に\n ほれっ！ ちゃんと死んでおろ:
My foolish disciple still believes Zenethia is
alive. I'll just have to force reality upon
her. "Look! She is indeed dead this time!"

333965.「ゼニアスと アストルティアのため\n 今度こそ 決着をつけるぞ。\n ……<p:
For both Zeniath and Astoltia's sake...
We'll settle this once and for all.

333966.「……いいね。\n 君たちの その覚悟……アゲぽよだ。:
Very good, I like it.
Your determination is super hype!

333969.「隠れても無駄だ。さっさと 姿を現せ！:
There's no point in hiding. Come out and
show yourself!

333971.「己の身すら守れぬくせに 何故 ついてきた？\n そなたは はじまりの地へ 戻っ:
Why did you follow us when you have not even
a means to defend yourself?! Return to the
Land of Beginnings right now!

333972.「……ラキは どうしても\n とうさまの王冠と王笏を 取り戻したい。:
...Lycae very much wants to get back Father's
Crown and Scepter.

333973.「グラさんは ゼニアスの主神にはならない。\n だから いつか現れる 新しい主神:
Mr. Gran isn't going to become the new
Almighty. So for the new Almighty that
does come someday, we need both of them!

333974.「ぜったいに 邪魔はしない！\n なにかあっても ラキのことは助けなくていい。\:
Lycae will not get in your way! If something
happens to him, you don't need to help.
Please...

333975.「帰れと言ったところで どうせ ついてくる。\n 知らないところで 捕まって 人:
If we tell him to go back, he'll just follow us anyway. Don't you think it'd be safer to take him along with us than leave him by his
lonesome to get captured?

333976.「それに ゼニアスを故郷とするのは 彼だけだ。\n 最後の戦いに 立ち合う権利は:
Besides...he's the only one out of all of us
who can actually call Zeniath home. He has
every right to be a part of this final battle.

333977.「もしかしたら 意外なところで\n 役に立ってくれるかもしれないし……ね。:
And who knows? There's always a chance you
might be able to help us...

333978.「……そこまで言うなら もう知らん。\n ついてくるのは構わんが 無茶だけはする:
...If you insist, then so be it. Follow us if
you like. Just don't make a fool of yourself.

333979.「わかった。いい子にしている！\n 約束する！！:
Okay! Lycae will be a good boy!
Promise!

333980.「頼りにしているよ。ちいさな神獣くん。\n それじゃ あらためて 出発しよう！:
We're counting on you, little beast!
Come on, let's keep moving!

333981.「待たされるのは 嫌い……。\n わたくし そう言ったはずだけれど。:
As I said before...
I do not like to be kept waiting.

333982.「継承者のオーブを 持ってきたというなら\n 特別に 許してさしあげましょう。:
If you've brought the Orb of Succession, then
I suppose I'll make an exception in sparing
your lives.

333983.「……そんなもの どこにも ない。\n ゼネシアねえさま！\n とうさまの王冠と:
There is no such thing, Sister! Give back
Father's Crown and Scepter!

333984.「継承者のオーブが ないなら……\n あなたがたに 用は ありませんね。\n ど:
If you do not hold the Orb...then you are
useless to me. How should I go about killing
you, I wonder?

333986.「主神の座を 我がものにせんがため\n ジア・クトの侵攻を 呼び込み\n ゼニア:
To take the Almighty's throne, you invited
the Dia Kut to invade this land, and caused
the curse of unmaking to appear...

333987.「女神ゼネシア！\n 貴様だけは 我らが 倒す！: Zenethia! This is where you alone will fall!

333988.「あらあら……。そんな 言葉遣いをしては\n いけませんよ？ ポルるん。\n ネ:
My, my... Portie, you shouldn't say such
harsh things. You're really hurting Zenny's
feelings...

333990.「おい！ 何をのんびり ながめておる！？: Hey! What are you doing just standing there?!

333992.「まあ 大変……！\n オーブを お早めに お出しなさいな。:
Well, this certainly does not bode well for
you! I'd suggest handing over that Orb soon.

333993.「残念ながら 伯母上にだけは\n 継承者のオーブは 渡せませんね……。:
Unfortunately for you, auntieーyou're the
one person we CAN'T entrust the Orb with...

333994.「ゼネシア伯母上……母ルティアナにかわり\n ゼニアスと アストルティアのため\:
Zenethia! On behalf of my mother, Lutiana...
And for the sake of both Zeniath of
Astoltia... You WILL be defeated here!

333996.「元にした神獣の 出来が悪いから\n あなたがたも 役に立たないのねえ……。:
The divine beast you are based on was feeble
and weak, so it's only natural you're just as
useless...

333997.「いいわ。代わりは いくらでも創生できる。\n あなたがたは 消えなさい……。:
No matter. I will create as many as necessary.
Begone...

333999.「創生のチカラは 生きとし生ける者への愛……\n こんなことのために 使うものじ:
The power of creation is the love for all
living things... It shouldn't be used to
just throw lives away!

334000.「ほら。連れてきて よかっただろう？:
See? Aren't you glad we brought him along
now?

334001.「継承者のオーブ……！？\n まさかっ！ 下等な神獣ふぜいが\n 主神に 成り上:
The Orb of Succession?! This cannot be!!
A lowly divine beast...has risen to become
Almighty?!

334003.「……いつか ラキが\n みんなを 平和な世界に創生してあげる。\n だから そ:
Lycae will create a peaceful world for
everyone to live in someday...
So, until that day comes...

334005.「愚かな父でも 出来損ないの妹でも\n けがらわしき獣でもないッ！\n ゼニアス:
I alone am Almighty! Not my foolish father,
my useless sister, nor some disgusting beast!

334006.「……かくなる上は そやつを喰らい\n 継承者のオーブを奪うのみ！:
I'll just have to devour you whole and take
the Orb for myself!!

334007.「誓約の子 <cs_pchero>……\n ラキと一緒に 戦って！\n ゼニアス:
Child of the Covenant, <cs_pchero>...
Fight with Lycae! We must defeat
Zenethia to save Zeniath!

334008.「神に背く 愚か者どもめ……\n 主神ゼネシアの裁きを 受けよ！！:
Blasphemous fools! You shall be judged by
Zenethiaーthe Almighty!!

334010.「まあ。なんと 無作法な……。\n お里が 知れますこと。:
My, how utterly rude...
It's quite obvious who you take after.

334012.「ふん。クチほどにもない……。\n 愛しい お母様のもとへ\n 今度こそ ちゃー:
Hmph. All that bark and no bite...
I'll be sure to give you a proper sendoff
to your precious mother this time.

334013.「だまれっ！\n 母 ルティアナより賜った 断罪の剣で\n その罪ごと 伯母上を:
Shut up! My mother gave me this sword, and
with it, you and your sins will be struck
down!

334014.「ぼうや。あなたに そのおもちゃは\n まだ 早いみたいね。:
You're not old enough to play with toys like
that, little boy.

334016.「果ての大地ゼニアスは わたくしのもの！\n ゼニアスの主神は わたくし ただひ:
Zeniath...belongs to me, and me alone!
I am...its true Almighty!! Nobody else...!

334054.「みなさん <cs_pchero>隊長たちの安否を\n 心配していたんですよ。\:
Everyone was quite worried about you all.
We are so glad to see you've returned safe
and sound!

334055.「海上の ガナン帝国城から まばゆい光が\n あふれると同時に ゼニアス全土から:
There was a dazzling light that burst forth from Gittingham Palace, and at that moment any signs of evil ceased to exist. It's all
thanks to your efforts.

334056.「上空に漂っていた 魔物たちを生み出す光球も\n 同時に 消失しました。\n す:
The orbs of light creating those monsters
disappeared then, too. Any and all threats
have vanished, it seems...

334057.「おうおう。やってくれたな <cs_pchero>！\n さっすが 俺たちの隊長:
Good job! You really did it, <cs_pchero>!
We weren't wrong to name you Captain!

334058.「……またしても 世界を救っちまうとか\n 張り切りすぎなんだよ。\n ま……心:
...Saving the world *again*, huh?
Talk about overdoing it. Well, not like
I was worried or anything.

334059.「お前……やっと 犬の姿から 戻れたのか。\n それにしては 浮かん顔だな。:
Oh...I see you've changed back from being a
dog. You're looking more cheerful now, at
least.

334060.「まあ……。大変だったのね ラキ。:
Well... You really went through a lot,
didn't you, Lycae?

334061.「本当は あなたたちと一緒に 戦いたかったけど\n 間に合わなくて ごめんなさい:
I really wished I could've fought alongside
you. I'm sorry I wasn't able to make it in
time.

334062.「<cs_pchero> ポルテちゃん ラキ。\n みんなが 無事でよかったわ。: But I am really glad that you're all safe.

334063.「……ありがとう メレちー！\n あたしこそ 心配かけちゃって ごめんね。\n:
Thanks, Merry! Sorry if I worried you.
I finally got my feelings all sorted out.

334065.「果ての大地ゼニアスを 苦しめた\n ガナン帝国からの侵攻は 潰え……\n この:
The Gittish Empire that threatened Zeniath
has been destroyed...and true peace has
returned.

334066.「ゼニアス防衛任務は これにて終了します。\n 燈火の調査隊あらため 燈火の防衛:
The defense of Zeniath has concluded, and with thatーthe Ember Defenders, formerly the Ember Explorersーare hereby dismissed! Everyone,
thank you for your excellent work!

334067.「ねえ <cs_pchero>隊長……。\n 師匠に なんか あったの？:
Say, <cs_pchero>...
Did something happen with my master?

334068.「ゼニアスが平和になったよーって 教えたくて\n さっきから 呼びかけてるんだけ:
I've been trying to tell them that Zeniath is
finally at peace now, but they've yet to
respond at all...

334069.「……ガナン帝国城での戦いは 激しかった。\n もうひとりのポルテは 疲れてる。:
The battle at Gittingham Palace was very hard,
so the other Porte is resting now. Maybe...
they will be better after some rest.

334070.「そーだね。帰ろ 帰ろ！: You're right. Come on, let's go home!

334071.「……創失を招くものが ポルテの中から\n 出てこないように ラキが 見張ってお:
Lycae will keep an eye on Porte to make sure
That Which Unmakes doesn't appear. If
something happens, he will tell you.

334073.「女神ルティアナの子 グランゼニス神\n そして 新世界の守り人 <cs_pch:
Gran Zenith, son of Goddess Lutiana...
<cs_pchero>, Guardian of the new world...
Listen well, Children of the Covenant.

334074.「女神ゼネシアがもたらした 禍根を断ち\n 果ての大地ゼニアスに 平和をもたらし:
You've destroyed the evil brought about by
Zenethia and brought peace to the land of
Zeniath. For this great deed...

334075.「また 神獣ラキを\n ゼニアスの 新たなる主神たるべく\n 導いた大功に 心か:
I would also like to express my gratitude
for guiding the divine beast Lycae to
becoming Zeniath's new Almighty.

334076.「しっかし 参ったなー オイ！\n 創失を招くものの正体が あの ポルテかよ！？:
But this is really a pickle were in, huh?! So That Which Unmakes is really Porte?! And on top of that, she's ALSO the embodiment
of Astoltia?

334077.「信じたくはないが……事実だ。\n 今のところ 創失を招くものとしての自我は\n:
It's difficult to believe...but it's true. For now, that personality has been sealed away. But when it decides to make its move
again...

334078.「あの娘を放っときゃ 創失を招くものが\n 暴れだして 創失の呪いで 滅亡！\n:
If we just leave her be, then that thing will go crazy with the curse of unmaking and destroy everything! And even if we do
defeat her, Astoltia's history...

334079.「かーっ！ やってられっか！\n これじゃあ お手上げだっての！！:
Aaaagh! I can't take this anymore!
This is totally hopeless!!

334080.「……悪ぃ。文句言いたいのは\n アンタたちのほうだよな。:
...Sorry. You guys are the ones who should
be complaining, not me.

334081.「チョベリバにも ほどがある。\n ……まさに 冗談は よしこさんだね。:
This is way past "totes cray".
...Okay, enough with the jokes already.

334083.「アストルティアの化身は\n 創失を招くものを 必死に 押さえ込み\n みずから:
The embodiment of Astoltia is desperately
trying to contain That Which Unmakes
inside itself.

334084.「ふたりのポルテは ひとつの存在。\n ポルテの心が 揺らげば\n 封じるチカラ:
The two Portes are one and the same.
If Porte's heart wavers, then the power
to seal it away might, too.

334085.「再び 乗っ取られるという危険は避けたい。\n ポルテ本人や 周囲に\n 創失を:
We want to avoid the possibility of her being controlled again. So, I ask you... Do not let Porte or anyone close to her know the
truth about That Which Unmakes.

334086.「なるべく いつもどおりに 過ごそう。\n そして……ポルテと アストルティアを:
Let's try and spend our time as normally as
we can. And, somehow...we'll find a way to
save both Porte and Astoltia.

334087.「……ま 今のところ\n まるっきり ノープランなんだけどね。:
Well, I certainly don't have a plan right
now.

334088.「ゼニアスを救ってくれた 恩返しだ。\n できることがあったら なんでも言ってく:
And of course, we owe you for saving Zeniath.
If there's anything we can do, please let us
know. We will be here if you need it.

334089.「……さてと <cs_pchero>。\n 気は重いけれど とりあえず 帰ろうか:
Well then... All this is real heavy on my
mind, but let's head back home! To Astoltia,
the place piled with problems...

336732.聖天のつばさで\n創失のガナン帝国領を 飛べるようになった。<me 71>:
You may now use the Wonderwing to
fly in the Unmade Gittish Empire.<me 71>

340293.「盛り上がってるところ すまない。\n ちょっとだけ いいかな？:
I'm sorry to interrupt the commotion.
May I have a moment?

340294.「……そなたを 忘れてはおらぬ。\n だが ゼネシア討伐についての 話し合いは\:
...We haven't forgotten. But right now is
not the best time to discuss how we can
defeat Zenethia.

340295.「そうじゃない。\n 私の神の器……当代の勇者 アンルシア姫なら\n ちゃーんと:
No, that's not what I was going to say. My
current divine vessel, that girl Anlucia...
She is very much alive and well.

340298.「あ……ありがとうございます。\n グランゼニスさま……。:
Great Gran Zenith!
T-thank you so much...!

340299.「ははっ！ 礼を言うのは こちらだろう。\n 助かったのは 君たち勇者のおかげ。:
Haha! I think it's I who should be thanking
you. I owe everything to you Heroes. Let me
just sayー"Thank you very macho!"

340300.「……初代勇者たちに 私が与えた祝福など\n 最初のきっかけに すぎない。:
The blessing I bestowed upon the first
generation of Heroes was merely the
beginning.

340301.「未熟だった私の ちいさなチカラを\n 何百倍 何千倍にも育み 世界を守ったのは:
It was youーthe Heroes across many generationsーwho nurtured my meager power into a hundred...no, a thousand times its
strength, and used it to protect the world.

340302.「私に 返した程度じゃあ\n その途方もない歩みが 揺らぐはずはない。\n アン:
Returning that power to me could never undo
the tremendous progress you've made. I am
proud of each and every one of you.

340304.「アンルシアより授かりし チカラにて\n 私 グランゼニスは 断罪の剣とともに甦:
By the power granted to me by Anlucia, I,
Gran Zenith, have been revived together
with the Sword of Atonement! And now...

340305.「母 ルティアナに 代わりて\n 果ての大地ゼニアスに害なす 女神ゼネシア\n:
On behalf on my mother, Lutiana...
For harming this land of Zeniath, the wicked
Zenethia will be judged for her sins!

340307.「ゼニアスと アストルティア……ふたつの世界を\n 我が盟友 <pc>と 私が…:
Zenethia and Astoltia...
As my Ally, <pc> and I will...

340308.「命に 別状はないとはいえ\n しばらくの間 無理は禁物！\n ……戦いなんて:
You may no longer be at death's door, but you
shouldn't push yourself so soon.
Fighting now is out of the question!

340309.「アンルシア。あなたの盟友と ともに\n この先の未来も 歩いていきたいというな:
Anlucia... If you wish for there to be a
future for you and your Ally to walk together,
then you must rest for now in Astoltia.

340310.「<pc>。グランゼニスさまと ともに\n ゼニアスを 救ってね。\n そして…:
Help Gran Zenith to save Zeniath.
And please...return to Astoltia safely,
okay?

340311.「……おーっし！\n んじゃ 約束どおり\n ガナン帝国城への道を 開いてやんぜ:
Aaaalrighty! Just as promised, I'll open
the way to the Gittingham Palace!

340312.「誓約の園に眠る かすかな面影……\n かつて 世界を救いし者を導いた 道しるべ:
The faint traces of those who once saved this
world that rest within these grounds...
I call upon your creation once more!

340313.「じいさんから預かったチカラも\n これで めでたく 売り切れだ！\n ……あと:
That's the last of the power the old man
gave me! The rest is up to you now!
Don't screw this up!

340316.星封の結晶に 果ての辺境エリアの\n雨の島が 登録されたようだ。<me 71>:
Pluvi Isle in the Furthest Frontier
is now registered in the Benevogem.<me 71>

340318.「王冠と王笏を 道連れにするとは……\n どこまでも 身勝手なやつめ。:
How selfish... To take both the Crown and
Scepter down with you.

340321.「喰ろうたはずの女神に 写し身を乗っ取られ\n ゼニアスなどという どうでもよい:
That goddess I devoured somehow took control,
and I was dragged against my will into this
trivial nonsense... But at lastーI am free.

340322.「ふたつの神器は失ったが 女神のチカラ\n こたびこそ 我が糧としてやる。:
The two divine artifacts may no longer be

me now.

340323.「いまわしき女神よ！\n そのチカラすべてを わたしに よこせ！:
Accursed goddess! Give all of your power
unto me!

340324.「創失せよ 女神ゼネシア……。\n この世から 完全に 消え去るがよい。:
Be unmade, Goddess Zenethia...
Disappear from this world forever!

340325.「貴様から得た 神のチカラ……\n 我が宿願の礎として\n ぞんぶんに 活かして:
And now... I intend to use the full extent
of this divine power as the cornerstone
of my long-awaited ambition!!

340326.「案ずるな <cs_pchero>……。\n 断罪の剣は 罪ある者だけを滅ぼすも:
Don't worry about me... The Sword only
destroys those who are sinful. I've only
a little...so it's just a flesh wound.

340327.「グラさん！ どうして かばった！？: Mr. Gura, why are you protecting him?!

340328.「母より賜りし剣が 教えてくれた……。\n 創失を招くものとは……ポルテ自身。:
The sword from my mother revealed the truth...
That Which Unmakes is Porte herself.

340329.「創失を招くものを このまま倒せば\n ポルテも 命を落とすんだ。\n ……それ:
If we strike him down, then Porte will lose
her life, too... And that's not all.

340330.「アストルティアの化身である ポルテ……\n 彼女を 完全に倒してしまえば 我々:
As the embodiment of Astoltia, if Porte is
to disappear completely...then our world
disappears with it.

340331.「そうとも。女神ルティアナが創生せし すべてを\n 創失の呪いで 消し去り\n:
Indeed. It is my wish to destroy everything
that Lutiana has created with the curse of
unmaking, and bring Astoltia to ruin!

340332.「わたし 創失を招くものこそが\n まことの アストルティアの化身！\n ……ア:
That Which Unmakes is the true embodiment of
Astoltia. Destruction is what it truly
desires...

340333.「すべては宿命。誰ひとりとて 罪はない。\n だが……<cs_pchero>。\:
Everything is fate. No one bears any guilt.
But you, <cs_pchero>...
You will be erased...

340334.<center>やめろ……！\n我が身を 勝手に あやつるなっ！: Stop! You won't take control from me!

340336.「信じられぬことだが……\n どうやら こやつは\n 我が魂から 生まれたものの:
I can't believe this...but that being was
somehow born from my soul...

340337.「あずかり知らぬ間に 我が身のうちに\n 不肖の弟子以外の人格が 生まれていた…:
Unbeknownst to me, a personality other than that of my ungrateful disciple took shape inside of me... And to think it turned out to
be That Which Unmakes...

340338.「……思い返してみれば\n ゼネシアに乗っ取られた 写し身以外 我は\n 創失を:
Come to think of it, aside from the copy
that Zenethia took over... I've not once
faced That Which Unmakes.

340339.「やつの出現は 決まって 我が倒れている間。\n 創失を招くものが 意識を失った:
He would only ever appear when I was down,
when I was unconcious... I was... I was him.
It was me.

340340.「すまぬ <cs_pchero>……。\n こと ここに至るまで 気づかなんだ。:
I'm sorry, <cs_pchero>...
It took me until now to realize.

340341.「一時的に……封じたに すぎぬ。\n このままでは いずれ……:
He's been sealed, but only temporarily.
If left alone, then sooner or later...

340343.「あれ……。ここ どこ？\n あたし まだ 夢を見てるのかな……。: Huh...? Where am I? Am I still dreaming...?

340344.「もしかして ゼニアスなの？\n ……師匠 ゼニアスに 来てたんだ。:
Is this Zeniath, by chance?
I see...my master came here...

340345.「……そうだ！ <cs_pchero> ラキ！\n 創失を招くものは どうなった:
Oh, yeah! You guys, did something happen
with That Which Unmakes? Is everyone
in Zeniath safe now?!

340346.「ぜんぶ……終わった。\n 悪いやつは ゼニアスから いなくなった。:
It's...it's all over now. The bad guys are all
gone.

340348.「そうだ。死んだ……。\n 女神ゼネシアは もう いない。\n 二度と よみがえ:
Yes. She's dead...
The goddess Zenethia is gone.
She's never coming back.

340350.「うん……そうだよね。\n 二度と 会えないんだって……\n あたしも……ほんと:
Yeah...it's true, isn't it?
I knew we'd never see each other again...
I... I knew that, too...

340353.創失の主神ゼネシアを倒した\n<cs_pchero>たちは\nはじまりの地へと:
Having defeated Zenethia, <cs_pchero>
and co. return to the Land of Beginnings...

340354.「……優しいのね <pc>。\n でも 私 もう決めたの。\n ゼニアスと アス:
You are too sweet, <pc>...
But I've already made up my mind.
This is for Zeniath and Astoltia's sake...

340355.「主神の王冠と 王笏よ……創失せよ！！:
O great Crown and Scepter of the Almighty...
Become unmade!!
